About Me

My mom told me to tell you ...

BIO

I am a mechanical engineering grad with a can do attitude and passion for new technologies. This has led me down an inevitable path of life-long learning in software development. I have developed several side projects, iOS mobile applications using Swift. I am self-motivated, detail oriented with interest in creating quality cross-platform mobile apps and websites, as well expanding my language knowledge base where opportunity exists.

Utility & PTV Engineer

Textron Specialized Vehicles
  • Responsible for proper design analysis, component part FEA and design optimizations that drive cost out opportunities for many current and new production parts used on PTV.

  • Collaborated with local, remote and international teams to define, design, review, and produce reliable product.

  • Created a data entry spreadsheet using Excel and Microsoft VBA for commonizing and streamline production part data entry.

Product Design Engineer

Textron Specialized Vehicles
  • Responsible for proper design analysis, component part FEA and design optimizations that drive cost out opportunities for many current and new production parts.

  • Collaborated with local, remote and international teams to define, design, review, and produce reliable product.

Freelance Software Development

Self-Motivated
  • Experience using Xcode IDE.
